content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you schedule your electrical service appointment. May I start by getting your name, please?
Thanks, Linda! Could you please provide your service address?
Thank you! Let me just check if we're able to service that area for electrical work.
Good news, Linda! We do service your area. When would be a good time for our technician to come by?
I need to look at my calendar to see when I'll be free, but I don't have it with me right now. Can I get back to you?
Of course, Linda! Just reach out when you have your calendar handy, and we'll get your appointment booked. If you need anything else in the meantime, feel free to ask!
reason: Customer unable to provide scheduling time and did not reschedule
